item.description:
cancel Add details/images No details, yet

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

I'll be hosting a rockin' New Year's eve party for few meetup groups!  Singles and couples welcomed!

Conveniently located at the British Beer Company in Walpole (Route 1 Southbound), this is guaranteed to be a great time!  Here are the specifics:

 

 

  • Private function room on the 2nd floor (no interference with the dinner crowd)
  • DJ, food and champagne toast included
  • Our own bathrooms, bar and bartender
  • 8:00 pm to 1:00 am
  • Only $25/pp!!!! if paid by Dec 30 ... $30 At the door
  • Payment due in advance to guarantee your spot *
  • Dance to a wide variety of music and not just the newest top 40, without being blasted into deafness.  We still rock...we just do it on our style!  And well, for those of you that already know me and have seen me on the dance floor...let's just say, I love to move and hope you do too!

* To pay:

  • Go to: http://www.aformalaffairdj.com/pricing.htm#bbc
  • Make anotation that it is for the BPSP/Nesters NY eve party.
  • If you want to pay in another way, please email Roger  at afadj@yahoo.com to make alternative arrangements

Walk-ins are welcome if there is still availability.   Chances are this will be sold out well before the event, so I highly suggest that you reserve and pay in advance so you aren't left standing at the door on NYE with nothing to do!

If you belong to multiple meetup groups, please only RSVP once on one site.  This event is limited to 100 people due to space limitations.

 

Discounted hotel rooms available!

If you don't live close please consider getting a room.  A discounted rate of $80 (reg $135) per night for 20 rooms only has been negotiate at the Holiday Inn Express Hotel in Sharon.  

Please call them directly, tell them you are with the New Years Eve Meetup Group and do so soon if you are interested before the rooms sell out! 

  • Holiday Inn Express Hotel Sharon
  • www.hiexpress.com
  • 395 Old Post Rd, Sharon - [masked]

Where can you get DJ, food, Champagne toast at a nice venue on New Years Eve for $25? Refunds only if this event is canceled.  If you pay for the event and cannot go, you are responsible for finding someone to take your place.
item.how_to_find_us: 2nd Floor Room - Enter through the Takeout door at the front of the bldg. We have the entire 2nd floor

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: New Years Eve Dance at the Walpole BBC
